title: Ham and chive pancakes with white asparagus sauce
ingredients: ['Asparagus', '600g white asparagus spears', '1 tablespoon vegetable stock granules', '300ml boiling water', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon butter', 'Pancakes', '250g plain flour', '250ml milk', '250ml water', '4 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon herb salt', '1 teaspoon savoury seasoning', '150g ham, diced', '1 bunch of chives, finely minced', 'butter or oil for frying pancakes', 'Sauce', '100ml double cream', '2 to 3 tablespoons white sauce mix']
